data.name: Zinari
data.description:
What Is Zinari Finance (ZINA)?


Zinari Finance is a decentralized finance platform designed to enable faster and cheaper cross-border payments. The token enables people in countries with currency and FX problems run local and international transactions without hurdles.


ZINA is the native payment token that is used for:


* Fees for processing transactions and storing data.

* Funds transfers, payments and storage of value

* Used for governance votes to determine how network resources are allocated.


ZINA Plans include:


* A Decentralized Payment platform that enables users send and receive funds from other territories using crypto rails

* Minting of Paper notes for crypto assets so non technical people can use crypto to make local payments

* New crypto powered checking and overdraft system that provides corporates a viable alternative to banking networks

* Main Net for launching stablecoins and crypto powered fintech projects

* Bring the next 100M crypto users from Africa and the Caribbeans.



## How Many ZINA Coins Are There in Circulation?


ZINA tokens launched on the Binance Smart Chain on April 15, 2020 with 100 billion ZINA tokens created at genesis. 5Billion tokens are burnt at each milestone of 1000 wallet holders with a total of 50 Billion tokens to be burnt at 10,000 wallet holders.



### Who Are the Founders of ZINA Protocol?


ZINARI Finance is the brainchild of brothers Hope and Michael Bernard both of whom have extensive experience in corporate finance and community building.

Both of them worked with Opera Pay(OPay Nigeria) as Business Development Managers and have also launched internet business radio, trading communities, Marketplace start-ups and educational communities.

This project is as a result of the hardships they faced trying to make international payments as Nigerians. It started as a side remittance project for importers in Lagos, but then developed into a full fledged crypto payment system that would solve this issue for millions of people in Africa.



### Where Can I Buy NEAR Protocol (NEAR)?


ZINA is available for trading on pancakeswap https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?inputCurrency=0x76beed9649c0c297cb6de10d07efd66db38e3c47
